content:
Edges Enum

Definition

Specifies which edges of a visual style element to draw.

In this Article

[System.Flags]
public enum Edges
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
Edges

Remarks

The Edges values are used as argument values in the DrawEdge method.

Fields

Bottom

The bottom edge of the element.
Diagonal

A diagonal border.
Left

The left edge of the element.
Right

The right edge of the element.
Top

The top edge of the element.
